extendedInfo.description: *****Requires TMobile's Theme Engine found in Cyanaogenmod's Roms**********Requires Root**********HDPI only**********PLEASE FOLLOW INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS IF THIS YOUR FIRST TIME INSTALLING A tHEME FOR THE THEME ENGINE**********Free Version, We also have a Donate Version with the smae Features*****A Minimal theme with hints of red, black, white.This will theme your phone will over 1800 different images, hitting all system apps and many 3rd party apps.Including but no limited to:Android SystemCalendarCameraContactsDeskclockDocs (google)EqualizerFace BookFM RadioGmailMarketMessagingMusic (stock)News and WeatherPandoraPhoneSettingsTalkTweetDeckYou Tubeand many more!This theme Will add a new wallpaper to you home screen(not working on the Thunderbolt)It will and a new system notification sound and Ringtone*****Install Instructions*****0. Uninstall any non market version you might have of this theme(will not apply to everyone)1. Install the app2. Open up the Theme chooser in your app drawer3. Choose "Linear" and hit apply4. Very important after you apply You must reboot for all changes to take effect.****Notes about Screen Shots. Tehy were taking using different elements of out theme.  1. Beautiful Widgets (in Market) with Linear skin2. ADWEX (in Market) with our Linear theme applied (search BSthemes3. Audio Manager pro (in Market)  With our Linear Theme (search BSthemes)****Other theme Aspects that the theme Engine wont theme.  We Will provide a Meta Morph for these Aspects. In our XDA thread.  Link will be provided here when its up.We want to thank all our testers and end users for the support they Offer.Also Please if you feel the need download our Donate version as this theme has been months in the Making.Special Thanks To Dave Kover for additional graphic HelpThank you all!  Brian & Steve  (BSthemes) ______________________________________________Keywords:CM7 themes, CM7, Cyanogen, Cyanogenmod, Linear, BSthemes, ADW, ADWEX, Theme Engine, Tmobile, T mobile

reviews.title: Best I Ever Had
reviews.comment: this is simply the best theme i\'ve ever had, and i\'ve had a lot. love the transparency throughout & the notification bar is second to none. 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not my cup of tea. The transparency is stunning, the red and black its great, but the white takes away. Other color versions would be awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like to change themes on a daily basis, and this One of the best themes I have seen, very clean. Captivate 2.3.4 CM7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps crashing adw ex. Shame because I really want this theme on my phone. :-( CM7 / mytouch 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: But get rid of the white horizontal line on the status bar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love the black and red styling, and love the battery indicator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really like this theme!
reviews.comment: Very well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome theme, I love how clean it looks and love the red accents. Evo 4g running Evo-Deck 1.2, 2.3.4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Super sick theme. Best ever. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: But the checkmarks are very confusing...wish there were only white checkmarks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks and works fantastic on my DX running newly flashed CM7! Wish I could post screen shots.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The dialer answer screen is the one complaint I have about this launcher. Please make it more appealing. It looks so complicated to answer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only complant I have is that some text is to dark to read other then that looks real good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Subtle & just right
reviews.comment: Overscroll glow, message bar + icons in message bar. Superbly understated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice. Especially like the touch of red, transparency, and battery meter
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool theme but you shouldn\'t advertise the 1800 images for apps in description when they aren\'t included. It\'s very misleading.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: no icons
reviews.comment: Like the look of the theme, but it doesn\'t change any of the icons. I have followed the instructions to a T, but icons are still the same.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really awesome theme! You can tell that a lot of work went into this. Looks great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Red can be bright still a awesome theme
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: U
reviews.comment: The best theme! But needs update..
reviews.author: A Google User
